Searching for hackers from Bulgaria interested in attending the Libre Graphics Meeting

Писмо с ей такова дълго заглавие се получи в пощенската група на екипа, организиращ Open Fest Sofia, та си позволих да го публикувам на сайта, тъй като може да се окаже интересно на някого.
Самото писмо съдържаше следните приказки:

Hi!I work on freeing up fonts, and I hope to find Bulgarian hackers
involved with graphics software in some way, because I would like to
invite them to apply for a fully-funded trip to Brussels for a free
software community conference at the end of this month:

www.libregraphicsmeeting.org

We are hoping to invite up to 3 Bulgarians to create contacts and
spark energy for continuing development after the conference – to get
inspired and carry on with the knowledge they gain at the event, and
grow the libre graphics community.

The organisers have secured major funding from Franophonie
(http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Francophonie) that will cover the flight
and a good hotel.

So, I hope that you can help, by forwarding this email to people or
project mailing lists in the Bulgarian free software community that
you know would be interesting in applying by emailing me or
„Femke Snelting“ snelting@collectifs.net
